attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my child was brutally raped about five minutes after by seventeen different dogs. I couldnâ€™t even reach my child because there was so many of them. Around an hour after hearing my child moan they finally moved away and I saw my 5 month old son covered in dog semen. Soon my husband came to the scene and refused to pick him up. We eventually decided to leave him there for a few minutes and come back with a towel. Then a car ran him over blaring sweet home Alabama. Then around another five minutes later seven houses blew up. And the dogs started to chase me and my husband. My entire family, including me, was brutally raped my dogs and my son was killed. Never again will I download this app.

attributes.title: the worst app on the app store!!
